      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicAuth
      # BasicAuth Enfore basic authentication by providing a AuthHandler.handler(user, pass), which must return true in order to gain access.

      # BodyParser Parse request bodies, supports *application/json*, *application/x-www-form-urlencoded*, and *multipart/form-data*.

      # BridgeSecureHandler Use it to secure EventBus Bridge.

      # Compress Middleware to compress responses and set the appropriate response headers.
      class  CookieParser
      # CookieParser Parse request cookies both signed or plain.
      class  Cors
      Basic CORS support.
      class  Csrf
      # Csrf This middleware adds a CSRF token to requests which mutate state.
      class  ErrorHandler
      # ErrorHandler Creates pretty print error pages in *html*, *text* or *json* depending on the *accept* header from the client.
      class  Favicon
      # Favicon By default serves the Yoke favicon, or the favicon located by the given ```path```.

      # Limit Limits the request body to a specific amount of bytes.
      class  Logger
      # Logger Logger for request.
      class  MethodOverride
      # MethodOverride Pass an optional ```key``` to use when checking for a method override, othewise defaults to *_method* or the header *x-http-method-override*.
      class  RequestProxy
      # RequestProxy RequestProxy provides web client a simple way to interact with other REST service providers via Yoke, meanwhile Yoke could pre-handle authentication, logging and etc.
      class  ResponseHeaders
      A simple Middleware that allows adding custom response headers to all YokeResponse.
      class  ResponseTime
      # ResponseTime Adds the ```x-response-time``` header displaying the response duration in milliseconds.
      class  Router
      # Router Route request by path or regular expression.

      # Session
      class  Static
      # Static Static file server with the given ```root``` path.
      class  Timeout
      # Timeout Times out the request in ```ms```, defaulting to ```5000```.
      class  Vhost
